TopicTitle: How many Kerbals does it take to screw In a light bulb?

Articles.Content:
A) they just time warp tells there\'s sun out

2) light bulb?

3) none, there not tell enough

Z) none, Only jeb can do it
3, because that is how many exist in every functional rocket. And they don\'t really live in anything besides rockets...
One. The other two are too busy screaming and freaking out.
4, because they got a smarter person in to do it.

Whats a light bulb?

On Kerbal we use Kixtures to cast Light.

And a Kixture is ever lasting.....
Three, One to admire the technology implemented, One to hold the ladder as he is afraid of heights, and one to nut up and do it.
Lightbulbs? Um... Oops, I knew we forgot something when we were building the capsule. Sorry, Bob, You\'ll just have to rotate the windows to face the Sun if you want light!

Lightbulbs? Um... Oops, I knew we forgot something when we were building the capsule. Sorry, Bob, You\'ll just have to rotate the windows to face the Sun if you want light!

Forgot? How dare you disgrace the top of the line Day and Night simulator that we installed into the capsule. That invention is state of the art!
1 but they use a rocket powered tool

10:

1. To buy the bulb

2. To drive it to the KSC

3. To bring extra gas to the broken down car halfway to the KSC

4. To build the ladder that gets it to the top of the capsule

5. To actually climb the ladder

6. To get the bulb up the ladder in one piece

7. To open the capsule door

8. To unscrew the old lightbulb

9. To throw it down the ladder

10. To put in the new lightbulb
Only one, but there is a 70% chance that it will explode.

Only one, but there is a 70% chance that it will explode.

Don\'t Kerbals use thermite as filament?
None of \'em. Them Kerbals fly rockets, understood? Screwing light bulbs and stuff is a game devs\' responsibility.
Two. It was found by the side of road. Bob and Bill installed it, despite Jeb\'s insistence it would cause problems.

Two. It was found by the side of road. Jeb installed it, despite Bill and Bobs insistence it would cause problems.

fixed

Don\'t Kerbals use thermite as filament?

I don\'t know, I was thinking of the trombone one when I posted this.

How many trombones does it take to screw in a light bulb?

Just one, but he\'ll do it too loudly.

I don\'t know, I was thinking of the trombone one when I posted this.

How many trombones does it take to screw in a light bulb?

Just one, but he\'ll do it too loudly.

One of my friends\' name is Steve, and he plays the trombone...
